event.description: Brian Roberts flies out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Adam Jones singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Gabe Kapler.
Nick Markakis lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Carlos Pena. Adam Jones doubled off 1st.
Aubrey Huff grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Melvin Mora flies out softly to right fielder Gabe Kapler.
Luke Scott walks.
Ty Wigginton grounds out, shortstop Jason Bartlett to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Gregg Zaun grounds out to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Robert Andino reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Jason Bartlett.
Brian Roberts homers (4) on a fly ball to right field. Robert Andino scores.
Adam Jones strikes out swinging.
Nick Markakis flies out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Aubrey Huff grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Melvin Mora grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Luke Scott grounds out, catcher Dioner Navarro to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Ty Wigginton flies out to right fielder Gabe Kapler.
Gregg Zaun homers (1) on a line drive to right field.
Robert Andino grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Brian Roberts grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Adam Jones grounds out, second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Nick Markakis lines out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
Aubrey Huff lines out to second baseman Akinori Iwamura.
Melvin Mora grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Luke Scott strikes out swinging.
Ty Wigginton pops out to first baseman Carlos Pena in foul territory.
Gregg Zaun walks.
Robert Andino grounds into a double play, third baseman Evan Longoria to second baseman Akinori Iwamura to first baseman Carlos Pena. Gregg Zaun out at 2nd.
Brian Roberts lines out to right fielder Gabe Kapler.
Adam Jones doubles (9) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Melvin Upton.
Pitching Change: Brian Shouse replaces Matt Garza.
Nick Markakis grounds out, first baseman Carlos Pena to pitcher Brian Shouse. Adam Jones to 3rd.
Aubrey Huff grounds out, pitcher Brian Shouse to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Pitching Change: Troy Percival replaces Brian Shouse.
Melvin Mora called out on strikes.
Melvin Upton grounds out, third baseman Melvin Mora to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Carl Crawford singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis.
With Evan Longoria batting, Carl Crawford steals (19) 2nd base, Carl Crawford scores. Throwing error by center fielder Adam Jones. Throwing error by catcher Gregg Zaun.
Evan Longoria called out on strikes.
Carlos Pena strikes out swinging.
Pat Burrell flies out to left fielder Luke Scott.
Jason Bartlett grounds out, shortstop Robert Andino to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Akinori Iwamura flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Gabe Kapler called out on strikes.
Dioner Navarro grounds out, pitcher Koji Uehara to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Melvin Upton grounds out, shortstop Robert Andino to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Carl Crawford called out on strikes.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Carlos Pena strikes out swinging.
Pat Burrell grounds out, third baseman Melvin Mora to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Jason Bartlett strikes out swinging.
Akinori Iwamura grounds out to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Gabe Kapler reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Melvin Mora.
Dioner Navarro doubles (4) on a fly ball to center fielder Adam Jones. Gabe Kapler to 3rd.
Melvin Upton strikes out swinging.
Carl Crawford grounds out, second baseman Brian Roberts to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Gabe Kapler scores. Dioner Navarro to 3rd.
Evan Longoria doubles (13) on a soft fly ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Dioner Navarro scores.
Koji Uehara intentionally walks Carlos Pena.
Pat Burrell pops out to first baseman Aubrey Huff in foul territory.
Jason Bartlett singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones.
Akinori Iwamura singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Melvin Mora. Jason Bartlett to 2nd.
Gabe Kapler pops out to second baseman Brian Roberts.
With Dioner Navarro batting, Koji Uehara picks off Jason Bartlett at 2nd on throw to Robert Andino.
Dioner Navarro singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis. Akinori Iwamura to 3rd.
Melvin Upton doubles (4) on a line drive to left fielder Luke Scott. Akinori Iwamura scores. Dioner Navarro to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Jamie Walker replaces Koji Uehara.
Carl Crawford hit by pitch.
Pitching Change: Bob McCrory replaces Jamie Walker.
Evan Longoria singles on a ground ball to left fielder Luke Scott. Dioner Navarro scores. Melvin Upton scores. Carl Crawford to 2nd.
Carlos Pena called out on strikes.
Pat Burrell flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Jason Bartlett pops out softly to shortstop Robert Andino.
Akinori Iwamura grounds out, pitcher Bob McCrory to second baseman Brian Roberts to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
